message:
I'm just learning Rails and Ruby and my aim is to understand how it works while it can be useful in a real life event, so i want to know Which is the best way to create a login in Rails ? 
i try many times but have many errors

data.message: Device is a kick ass gem for making Logins, Registration and all the forget password shit :)

I really recommend you pick up at least two books and work your way through them. There is also the rails tutorial http://ruby.railstutorial.org/
For the books, I recommend agile Web development in rails 4, that's a must have, must read.
And Crafting rails 4 applications: Expert practices for everyday rails development will give you some good ammunition
Check Nettuts courses it's really worth the payment!
